descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------
DESCRIPTION
----------------------------------
500 Septims for a follower that looks like he could break his back when he gets off the chair? Not anymore! This mod removes a few years from Belrand by adjusting a few facial features and giving him hair, while maintaining his \'battle-mage\'-esque feel.

----------------------------------
WHAT DOES IT DO?
----------------------------------
This mod only edits Belrand\'s face mesh and sets him to be essential (won\'t die).
Nothing more.

----------------------------------
COMPATIBILITY
----------------------------------
Because this is only a mesh-changing modification, I doubt there will be any conflicts, unless you already have a custom mesh for Belrand. I AM using the \'Better Males\' mod, however. Further testing needs to be done to check if this mod disrupts others.
author: xdeiog
